## [Topics](/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionEvents#topics)

### [Detecting collisions](/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionEvents#Detecting-collisions)

[`struct Began`](/documentation/realitykit/collisionevents/began)An event raised when two objects collide.[`struct Updated`](/documentation/realitykit/collisionevents/updated)An event raised on every frame when two objects are in contact.[`struct Ended`](/documentation/realitykit/collisionevents/ended)An event raised when two objects, previously in contact, separate.## [See Also](/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionEvents#see-also)
